name: Disney Classic "Beauty and Beast" Quiz | Movies | 15 Questions

questions.text: What is Gaston especially good at (mentioned in his song)?
What is on Gaston's head when he rises from the mud puddle after Belle has rejected his proposal?
What popular TV show is Jerry Orbach, the voice of Lumiere, a regular on (as of January 2001)?
questions.explanation:
Law and Order.

	He has played Lenny Brisco for years... and he doesn't really have a French accent!

questions.text: In what other Disney movie has the Beast made a cameo in?
questions.explanation:
Aladdin.

	He was one of the toy animals that the Sultan was playing with

questions.text: Where are the castle's prison cells located?
Who provides the voice of the wardrobe?
What was the book that the bookseller gave to Belle to keep about?
questions.correct: Far-off places, daring swordfights, magic spells, a prince in disguise
options: A little mermaid who dreamed of something more
questions.explanation:
Far-off places, daring swordfights, magic spells, a prince in disguise.

	She borrowed a book about an ogre and a beanstalk, but the book he gave her was about far-off places, daring swordfights and a prince in disguise.

questions.text: Finish this line: 'Be our guest, be our guest...'?
questions.correct: Put our service to the test
options: See our service is the best
Put our cooking to the test
See our cooking is the best
questions.explanation: Put our service to the test.

questions.text: What is the Beast's real name?
questions.explanation:
It is never mentioned.

	They never have mentioned the Beast's real name. Some people claim that they've seen the name 'Vincent' in the stained glass window at the beginning of the film, but it is actually part of a Latin phrase (as the Walt Disney Company has verified).

LeFou.

	Interestingly, 'LeFou' means 'The Fool' in French, which fits the character very well!

questions.text: How tall was the Beast, according to Maurice?
Was the castle enchanted more than 3 years?
Who is the first object to spot Belle?
questions.explanation:
Chip.

	Chip is the one that sees Belle first, but no one believes him until Lumiere and the maid spot her.
